name: Mobivery
description: MOBIVERY (Mobility Everywhere) is a fast growing and leading Spanish start up focused on designing, and developing mobile applications for corporate customers, in Spain and abroad. Thye company is a certified development partner in all major mobile platforms: iPhone, Palm Pre, Google Android. With over 300 apps in its portfolio, they has exceeded 10 M dowloands, both through corporate projects and proprietary apps.
